text: "So Am I" is an electropop song by American singer Ava Max. It was released on March 7, 2019. It is from her debut studio album, Heaven & Hell. The lyrics speak of self-love, being an outcast, and not fitting into society. A remixed version by South Korean boy band NCT 127 was released on July 3, 2019 with additional rap verses in both English and Korean. ==References== Category:2019 songs Category:Ava Max songs
title: So Am I (song)
